metadata.title: CVE-2018-19827 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
In LibSass 3.5.5, a use-after-free vulnerability exists in the SharedPtr class in SharedPtr.cpp (or SharedPtr.hpp) that may cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19827` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsass1 - 3.5.5-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsass package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.5-4').
